content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at my current position, but it is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt. 
# To operate the furnace, I need to add coal as fuel and insert the iron ore to be smelted into iron plates.

# I will first insert coal into the furnace to provide it with the necessary fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace.position, quantity=5)  # Adding 5 coal to the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after adding coal.
